attributes.action: Allow kids a week off school.
attributes.additional_details: Like every working person kids should be allowed to miss school for one week in a year. That will results in more families affording a holiday abroad as they will be able to pick a non peaks times to travel.
attributes.background: To allow every school kid to absent from school for one week.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600111
